Now<S>1161</S> before<S>4253</S> the feast<S>1859</S> of the passover<S>3957</S>, when Jesus<S>2424</S> knew<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> his<S>846</S> hour<S>5610</S> was come<S>2064</S> that<S>2443</S> he should depart<S>3327</S> out of<S>1537</S> this<S>5127</S> world<S>2889</S> unto<S>4314</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, having loved<S>25</S> his own<S>2398</S> which<S>3588</S> were in<S>1722</S> the world<S>2889</S>, he loved<S>25</S> them<S>846</S> unto<S>1519</S> the end<S>5056</S>.
And<S>2532</S> supper<S>1173</S> being ended<S>1096</S>, the devil<S>1228</S> having now<S>2235</S> put<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the heart<S>2588</S> of Judas<S>2455</S> Iscariot<S>2469</S>, Simon's<S>4613</S> son, to<S>2443</S> betray<S>3860</S> him<S>846</S>;
Jesus<S>2424</S> knowing<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> the Father<S>3962</S> had given<S>1325</S> all things<S>3956</S> into<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> hands<S>5495</S>, and<S>2532</S> that<S>3754</S> he was come<S>1831</S> from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> went<S>5217</S> to<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S>;
He riseth<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> supper<S>1173</S>, and<S>2532</S> laid aside<S>5087</S> his garments<S>2440</S>; and<S>2532</S> took<S>2983</S> a towel<S>3012</S>, and girded<S>1241</S> himself<S>1438</S>.
After that<S>1534</S> he poureth<S>906</S> water<S>5204</S> into<S>1519</S> a bason<S>3537</S>, and<S>2532</S> began<S>756</S> to wash<S>3538</S> the disciples'<S>3101</S> feet<S>4228</S>, and<S>2532</S> to wipe<S>1591</S> them with the towel<S>3012</S> wherewith<S>3739</S> he was<S>2258</S> girded<S>1241</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> cometh he<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S>: and<S>2532</S> Peter<S>1565</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, dost<S>3538</S> thou<S>4771</S> wash<S>3538</S> my<S>3450</S> feet<S>4228</S>? <sup>Peter saith: Gr. he saith</sup>
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, What<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> do<S>4160</S> thou<S>4771</S> knowest<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> now<S>737</S>; but<S>1161</S> thou shalt know<S>1097</S> hereafter<S>3326</S> <S>5023</S>.
Peter<S>4074</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Thou shalt<S>3538</S> never<S>1519</S> <S>165</S> <S>3364</S> wash<S>3538</S> my<S>3450</S> feet<S>4228</S>. Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, If<S>3362</S> I wash<S>3538</S> thee<S>4571</S> not<S>3362</S>, thou hast<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> part<S>3313</S> with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S>.
Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, not<S>3361</S> my<S>3450</S> feet<S>4228</S> only<S>3440</S>, but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> my hands<S>5495</S> and<S>2532</S> my head<S>2776</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> to him<S>846</S>, He that is washed<S>3068</S> needeth<S>5532</S> not<S>3756</S> <S>2192</S> save<S>2228</S> to wash<S>3538</S> his feet<S>4228</S>, but<S>235</S> is<S>2076</S> clean<S>2513</S> every whit<S>3650</S>: and<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> clean<S>2513</S>, but<S>235</S> not<S>3780</S> all<S>3956</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he knew<S>1492</S> who<S>3588</S> should betray<S>3860</S> him<S>846</S>; therefore<S>5124</S> <S>1223</S> said he<S>2036</S>, Ye are<S>2075</S> not<S>3780</S> all<S>3956</S> clean<S>2513</S>.
So<S>3767</S> after<S>3753</S> he had washed<S>3538</S> their<S>846</S> feet<S>4228</S>, and<S>2532</S> had taken<S>2983</S> his<S>846</S> garments<S>2440</S>, and was set down<S>377</S> again<S>3825</S>, he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Know ye<S>1097</S> what<S>5101</S> I have done<S>4160</S> to you<S>5213</S>?
Ye<S>5210</S> call<S>5455</S> me<S>3165</S> Master<S>1320</S> and<S>2532</S> Lord<S>2962</S>: and<S>2532</S> ye say<S>3004</S> well<S>2573</S>; for<S>1063</S> so I am<S>1510</S>.
If<S>1487</S> I<S>1473</S> then<S>3767</S>, your Lord<S>2962</S> and<S>2532</S> Master<S>1320</S>, have washed<S>3538</S> your<S>5216</S> feet<S>4228</S>; ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> ought<S>3784</S> to wash<S>3538</S> one another's<S>240</S> feet<S>4228</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I have given<S>1325</S> you<S>5213</S> an example<S>5262</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye<S>5210</S> should do<S>4160</S> as<S>2531</S> <S>2532</S> I<S>1473</S> have done<S>4160</S> to you<S>5213</S>.
Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, The servant<S>1401</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> greater than<S>3187</S> his<S>846</S> lord<S>2962</S>; neither<S>3761</S> he that is sent<S>652</S> greater than<S>3187</S> he that sent<S>3992</S> him<S>846</S>.
If<S>1487</S> ye know<S>1492</S> these things<S>5023</S>, happy<S>3107</S> are ye<S>2075</S> if<S>1437</S> ye do<S>4160</S> them<S>846</S>.
I speak<S>3004</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>4012</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>: I<S>1473</S> know<S>1492</S> whom<S>3739</S> I have chosen<S>1586</S>: but<S>235</S> that<S>2443</S> the scripture<S>1124</S> may be fulfilled<S>4137</S>, He that eateth<S>5176</S> bread<S>740</S> with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S> hath lifted up<S>1869</S> his<S>846</S> heel<S>4418</S> against<S>1909</S> me<S>1691</S>.
Now<S>575</S> <S>737</S> I tell<S>3004</S> you<S>5213</S> before<S>4253</S> it come<S>1096</S>, that<S>2443</S>, when<S>3752</S> it is come to pass<S>1096</S>, ye may believe<S>4100</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> he. <sup>Now: or, From henceforth</sup>
Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, He that receiveth<S>2983</S> whomsoever<S>1437</S> <S>5100</S> I send<S>3992</S> receiveth<S>2983</S> me<S>1691</S>; and<S>1161</S> he that receiveth<S>2983</S> me<S>1691</S> receiveth<S>2983</S> him that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S>.
When Jesus<S>2424</S> had<S>2036</S> thus<S>5023</S> said<S>2036</S>, he was troubled<S>5015</S> in spirit<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> testified<S>3140</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> you<S>5216</S> shall betray<S>3860</S> me<S>3165</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> looked<S>991</S> one on another<S>1519</S> <S>240</S>, doubting<S>639</S> of<S>4012</S> whom<S>5101</S> he spake<S>3004</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> there was<S>2258</S> leaning<S>345</S> on<S>1722</S> Jesus'<S>2424</S> bosom<S>2859</S> one<S>1520</S> of his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, whom<S>3739</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> loved<S>25</S>.
Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> therefore<S>3767</S> beckoned<S>3506</S> to him<S>5129</S>, that he should ask<S>4441</S> who<S>5101</S> it should<S>302</S> be<S>1498</S> of<S>4012</S> whom<S>3739</S> he spake<S>3004</S>.
He<S>1565</S> then<S>1161</S> lying on<S>1968</S> <S>1909</S> Jesus'<S>2424</S> breast<S>4738</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, who<S>5101</S> is it<S>2076</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S>, He<S>1565</S> it is<S>2076</S>, to whom<S>3739</S> I shall give<S>1929</S> a sop<S>5596</S>, when I<S>1473</S> have dipped<S>911</S> it. And<S>2532</S> when he had dipped<S>1686</S> the sop<S>5596</S>, he gave<S>1325</S> it to Judas<S>2455</S> Iscariot<S>2469</S>, the son of Simon<S>4613</S>.sop: or, morsel
And<S>2532</S> after<S>3326</S> the sop<S>5596</S> <S>5119</S> Satan<S>4567</S> entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> him<S>1565</S>. Then<S>3767</S> said<S>3004</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto him<S>846</S>, That<S>3739</S> thou doest<S>4160</S>, do<S>4160</S> quickly<S>5032</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> no man<S>3762</S> at the table<S>345</S> knew<S>1097</S> for what<S>4314</S> intent<S>5101</S> he spake<S>2036</S> this<S>5124</S> unto him<S>846</S>.
For<S>1063</S> some<S>5100</S> of them thought<S>1380</S>, because<S>1893</S> Judas<S>2455</S> had<S>2192</S> the bag<S>1101</S>, that<S>3754</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Buy<S>59</S> those things that<S>3739</S> we have<S>2192</S> need of<S>5532</S> against<S>1519</S> the feast<S>1859</S>; or<S>2228</S>, that<S>2443</S> he should give<S>1325</S> something<S>5100</S> to the poor<S>4434</S>.
He<S>1565</S> then<S>3767</S> having received<S>2983</S> the sop<S>5596</S> went<S>1831</S> immediately<S>2112</S> out<S>1831</S>: and<S>1161</S> it was<S>2258</S> night<S>3571</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S>, when<S>3753</S> he was gone out<S>1831</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>3004</S>, Now<S>3568</S> is<S>1392</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> glorified<S>1392</S>, and<S>2532</S> God<S>2316</S> is glorified<S>1392</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>.
If<S>1487</S> God<S>2316</S> be glorified<S>1392</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>, God<S>2316</S> shall<S>1392</S> also<S>2532</S> glorify<S>1392</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> himself<S>1438</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall<S>1392</S> straightway<S>2117</S> glorify<S>1392</S> him<S>846</S>.
Little children<S>5040</S>, yet<S>2089</S> a little while<S>3397</S> I am<S>1510</S> with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S>. Ye shall seek<S>2212</S> me<S>3165</S>: and<S>2532</S> as<S>2531</S> I said<S>2036</S> unto the Jews<S>2453</S>,<S>3754</S> Whither<S>3699</S> I<S>1473</S> go<S>5217</S>, ye<S>5210</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> come<S>2064</S>; so<S>2532</S> now<S>737</S> I say<S>3004</S> to you<S>5213</S>.
A new<S>2537</S> commandment<S>1785</S> I give<S>1325</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>2443</S> ye love<S>25</S> one another<S>240</S>; as<S>2531</S> I have loved<S>25</S> you<S>5209</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> love<S>25</S> one another<S>240</S>.
By<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> shall<S>1097</S> all<S>3956</S> men know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> ye are<S>2075</S> my<S>1699</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, if<S>1437</S> ye have<S>2192</S> love<S>26</S> one to another<S>1722</S> <S>240</S>.
Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, whither<S>4226</S> goest<S>5217</S> thou? Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, Whither<S>3699</S> I go<S>5217</S>, thou canst<S>1410</S> not<S>3756</S> follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S> now<S>3568</S>; but<S>1161</S> thou shalt follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S> afterwards<S>5305</S>.
Peter<S>4074</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, why<S>1302</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> I follow<S>190</S> thee<S>4671</S> now<S>737</S>? I will lay down<S>5087</S> my<S>3450</S> life<S>5590</S> for<S>5228</S> thy sake<S>4675</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, Wilt thou lay down<S>5087</S> thy<S>4675</S> life<S>5590</S> for<S>5228</S> my sake<S>1700</S>? Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, The cock<S>220</S> shall<S>5455</S> not<S>3364</S> crow<S>5455</S>, till<S>2193</S> <S>3739</S> thou hast denied<S>533</S> me<S>3165</S> thrice<S>5151</S>.
